name: emi.lb
description: The Logging and Bookkeeping service (LB) tracks jobs in terms of events (important points of job life, e.g. submission, finding a matching CE, starting execution etc.) gathered from various WMS components as well as CEs (all those have to be instrumented with LB calls).
releaseNotes:
What's new

    * Extended authorization features

    * Controlling permissions to log user tags

    * Support for changing job owners

    * Additional information available through the HTTPs interface

    * up-to-date wsdl

    * better support for displaying collections

    * server version information

    * L and B per-CE statistics

    * Support for publishing L and B notification messages through messaging

    * Bug fixes

    * Several bottlenecks addressed in the server and interlogger

    * Library versioning fixed



Deployment notes

    * glite-LB metapackage is installed by yum. yaim configuration requires, at the very least, setting MYSQL_PASSWORD, SITE_NAME and SITE_EMAIL in the site-info.def file. Reconfiguration is required. reconfiguration by YAIM will restart the service automatically.



There was major restructuring of dependencies compared to L and B 2.x, caused by conversion to EPEL-based dependencies.



Known Issues

    * Due to faulty DNS over IPv6 resolution in the c-ares library (v. 1.6.0), L and B does not work in most scenarios involving IPv6-only machines. Upgrade c-ares to 1.7.3 and relaunch yaim to get full IPv6 functionality.
